resources.string: The most useful utilities for your screen reader

- The extension can be useful in next situations: 
 1) Typing: Type speedly (Warning: Its works well only with Gboard) 
 2) Samsung internet: This tool can help with Samsung internet accessibility for Jieshuo Screen Reader 
 Developed by Aisulu Ait (Smit TV) 
 Open source 
 https://github.com/Smit-TV
